definition: to fall ill and die/to die of illness
lit. to be born, to grow old, to get sick and to die/fig. the fate of humankind (i.e. mortality)

sentences.english: And the son of the precious people believe city jun also to die at this time.
sentences.chinese: 而金貴人之子信城君也於此時病死。

sentences.english: The time of stay in SICU and mortality rate were recorded.
sentences.chinese: 兩組住院時間和病死率差異無顯著性意義。

sentences.english: Objective To study the role of the overall deli very monitoring in decreasing the case mortality rate of perinatal children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討分娩全程監護在降低圍生兒病死率中的作用。

sentences.english: Objective To decrease the injury rate and mortality of breech delivery during perinatal period.
sentences.chinese: 目的降低臀位分娩時圍產兒的損傷率及病死率。

sentences.english: The acceptable level should be below 1%.
sentences.chinese: 可接受的病死率應低於1%。

sentences.english: Because tussahs are dying in large quantities, the price of silk keeps increasing.
sentences.chinese: 由於柞蠶的大批病死，絲價一路上漲。

sentences.english: Since the year 1878, no deaths or births have been permitted near the shrine.
sentences.chinese: 1878年以來，此處就禁止了任何生老病死。

sentences.english: Nipah virus causes acute encephalitis in human, with high mortality.
sentences.chinese: 尼帕病毒引起人類急性腦炎，病死率高。

sentences.english: Death from illness is ideal, whereas accidental death and suicide carry stigmas or bad luck.
sentences.chinese: 病死是理想的，反之意外死亡和自殺帶來恥辱和厄運。

sentences.english: Are we born into the world just to suffer, grow old, and die?
sentences.chinese: 我們生下來就是爲了受生老病死的苦嗎？

sentences.english: Hippocrates after curing many diseases himself fell sick and died.
sentences.chinese: 希波克拉底在治癒許多病人之後自己病死了。

sentences.english: The history of Qin Hui is dead.
For 2006, the case fatality rate was 70%.
At the early age of forty-three he died of phthisis.
sentences.chinese: 他在四十四歲的壯年因爲肺癆病死去。

sentences.english: Both boys had contact with sick/dead poultry prior to the illness onset.
sentences.chinese: 兩名男童都有發病前與病死家禽的密切接觸史。

sentences.english: He always knows about life and death.
sentences.chinese: 他肯定知道這些生老病死的事情。

definition: sudden attack of a serious illness
to fall gravely ill, never to recover (idiom)
to catch an illness/to get infected with a disease
to die in a foreign land/to die abroad
to commit suicide on the orders of a sovereign (old)
to die an untimely death (idiom)/to be cut off in one's prime
to fall ill/to contract a disease
